data.eml:eml: The Maluti Mystery revisited: Taxonomy of African River Frogs (Pyxicephalidae, Amietia) on the Drakensberg Mountains in southern Africa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Channing, Alan (2015): The Maluti Mystery revisited: Taxonomy of African River Frogs (Pyxicephalidae, Amietia) on the Drakensberg Mountains in southern Africa. Zootaxa 3925 (2): 271-280, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3925.2.8
